subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Frank's boxolgy/LM3820-AM-MK484Output.JPG 
  Uploaded by : purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...> 
  Description : Using the MK484 TRF chip as an additional IDF amp and audio detector. It has the advantage of have a variable AGC level.  Use this circuit with the sweep and audio circuits.  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Frank%27s%20boxolgy/LM3820-AM-MK484Output.JPG 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...>
